titles.title: To require the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to conduct a study and develop a public education program on micromobility technologies, high speed personal transportation devices, and certain road users, and for other purposes.

To require the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to conduct a study and develop a public education program on micromobility technologies, high speed personal transportation devices, and certain road users, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
